column2: Position Title:   Field Sales Officer - Home Loan Banking Job Summary:   The Field Sales Officer in Home Loan Banking is responsible for generating new business opportunities and promoting home loan products to prospective customers. They engage in direct sales activities, including prospecting, lead generation, and client meetings, to achieve sales targets and contribute to the growth of the home loan portfolio. The role requires strong sales skills, customer relationship management abilities, and a thorough understanding of home loan products and processes. Responsibilities: Business Development: Identify and pursue new business opportunities through proactive prospecting and lead generation activities. Build and maintain a pipeline of potential home loan customers through networking, referrals, and cold calling. Conduct market research to identify target segments and develop strategies to penetrate the market effectively. Client Relationship Management: Establish and nurture relationships with prospective customers to understand their financial needs and preferences. Conduct thorough needs assessments and provide tailored home loan solutions to meet customer requirements. Follow up with leads and maintain regular communication throughout the sales process to ensure customer satisfaction. Sales Execution: Present home loan products and services to prospective customers, highlighting features, benefits, and competitive advantages. Negotiate terms and conditions, including interest rates, loan amounts, and repayment schedules, in accordance with company policies and guidelines. Prepare and submit loan applications accurately and efficiently, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and internal procedures. Sales Reporting and Analysis: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, including customer interactions, leads, and pipeline status. Prepare regular sales reports and forecasts to track performance against targets and identify areas for improvement. Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for business growth and development. Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, internal policies, and industry standards throughout the sales process. Conduct thorough documentation and verification of customer information to mitigate risks and prevent fraudulent activities. Stay updated on changes in regulations and industry practices related to home loan banking and incorporate them into sales strategies and processes. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or related field. Proven experience in sales, preferably in the banking or financial services industry. Strong knowledge of home loan products, processes, and regulations. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Demonstrated ability to build and maintain customer relationships. Results-driven with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Proficiency in CRM software, Microsoft Office Suite, and other sales tools.
